src:
Timor Leste Andalkan Bomber Kontroversial Gali Freitas Hadapi Timnas Indonesia U-19
05 Nov 2019, 17:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 perlu waspada pada partai pertama Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Sebab lawan yang dihadapi, Timor Leste U-19, akan mengandalkan bomber kontroversial, Paulo Freitas.
Nama Freitas sempat menjadi buah bibir lantaran membela Timor Leste U-15 di Piala AFF U-15 2019, Juli lalu. Pasalnya, dia mempunyai kemiripan secara fisik dan nama dengan pemain yang memperkuat Timor Leste senior di Piala AFF 2018.
Beberapa negara juga sempat mengajukan protes terkait dugaan pemalsuan umur Freitas. Tapi, AFF menyatakan sang pemain tidak terbukti melakukan pencurian usia.
"Kan waktu itu Freitas sudah dites dan segala macam. Jadi saya kira AFC sudah tahu dengan Freitas," ujar asisten pelatih Timor Leste, Eduardo Pereira saat sesi konferensi pers di Hotel Atlet Century, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11).
"Saat ini, dia tidak mempunyai beban karena dugaan itu dan dia akan bermain untuk kami," katanya menambahkan.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Timor Leste Rely on Controversial Bomber Explores Freitas to Face Indonesian National Team U-19
05 Nov 2019, 17:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-19 national team needs to be vigilant on the first party of Group K Qualification Cup AFC U-19 2020 at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Because the opponents faced, East Timor U-19, will rely on the controversial bomber, Paulo Freitas.
The name Freitas had become a byword for defending East Timor U-15 in the AFF U-15 2019 Cup, last July. The reason is, he has a physical resemblance and a name with a player who strengthens senior Timor Leste in the 2018 AFF Cup.
Several countries also had protested related to the alleged forgery of Freitas' age. But, AFF said the player was not proven to have committed age theft.
"At that time Freitas was tested and all sorts of things. So I think the AFC knew about Freitas," said East Timor assistant coach Eduardo Pereira during a press conference session at the Century Athletes Hotel, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5).
"At the moment, he has no burden because of the suspicion and he will play for us," he added.

Read the next page, Bolaneters.
